title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other large language models locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama server; works in Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous & async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain adapter to use Ollama models as LLMs, embeddings and tool-calling agents.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich ChatGPT-style web UI for Ollama (formerly Ollama-WebUI).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; Maven artifact provides fluent API & streaming support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama; supports generate, chat, embeddings and listing local models.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI that wraps Ollama with chat history, syntax themes and shortcuts.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into GitHub Copilot-style inline suggestions.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: LangChain agents, RAG with Chroma, function-calling examples, Docker stacks.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that streams Ollama replies, supports threads & slash commands.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama inside no-code workflows; supports chat and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU and PVC support.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a CI service for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Unofficial Rust crate with async client for generate/chat/embeddings endpoints.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET SDK for Ollama; supports IAsyncEnumerable streaming and dependency injection.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that answers channel mentions using a local Ollama model.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client for Ollama; go get github.com/ollama/ollama/api.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot
summary: Minimal RAG chatbot template using Ollama, Sentence-Transformers and FAISS.
